original_text: And Jonathan gave his weapons to his boy and said to him, “Go and carry them to the city.”
korean_text: 요나단이 그의 무기를 아이에게 주며 이르되 이것을 가지고 성읍으로 가라 하니

sentences.original_text: And Jonathan gave his weapons to his boy
sentences.korean_translation: 요나단은 자기 소년에게 자기 병기를 주었고

sentences.original_text: “Go and carry them to the city.”
